data.title: Nestlé, Mars and Hershey 'breaking promises over palm oil use' - This year’s Halloween confectionery will contain palm oil grown on land that should lawfully be habitat to orangutans, rhinos and clouded leopards, despite commitment to clean up supply chains

World's witnessing a new Gilded Age as billionaires’ wealth swells to $6tn - The world’s super-rich hold the greatest concentration of wealth since the US Gilded Age at the turn of the 20th century, when families like the Carnegies, Rockefellers and Vanderbilts controlled vast fortunes.
Nurses returning from Puerto Rico accuse the federal govt of leaving people to die - "We cannot be silent while millions of people continue to endure these conditions."
Spanish Senate votes to seize control of Catalonia; Seeks rebellion charges against Catalan parliament members that voted for independence
Saudi Arabia criticized for giving robot citizenship, as it restricts women's rights
Spain announces intent to sack Catalonia's government
The World Spent $14.4 Billion on Conservation, and It Actually Worked: Between 1992-2003, that investment led to a 29 percent decrease in the rate of biodiversity decline.
Spain's PM dismisses Catalonia's government, dissolves its Parliament and calls regional election on 21 December
